short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop green alternatives. Earn impact rewards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ShopEco makes eco-conscious shopping easier and cheaper! 
It reveal climate impacts behind products, recommend greener alternatives, and track personal impact from your purchase decision. You can easily share your positive climate impact to social network and inspire friends for eco-conscious shopping. You can raise a request to companies for more sustainability or transparency, and ShopEco will amplify your voices.

Notice that this is a beta version of its MVP now. It limits to sneaker shopping and only works on amazon.com as of now. You are welcome to submit feedback and let us know the next product category or shopping site to expand.
